title: Estonia Inflation Rate
description: Inflation Rate in Estonia decreased to 22.50 percent in October from 23.70 percent in September of 2022. Inflation Rate in Estonia averaged 3.78 percent from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 24.80 percent in August of 2022 and a record low of -2.17 percent in October of 2009. In Estonia, the inflation rate measures a broad rise or fall in prices that consumers pay for a standard basket of goods. This page provides - Estonia Inflation Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistics Estonia
